Closes #257

Don't allow line wrapping for markdown.
Indicate private flag of repos and gists.
Update Crashlytics setup.
Only start Crashlytics for sane devices on release builds.

Improve progress dialog state tracking.

Make sure to follow the host activity's lifecycle by implementing it as
a DialogFragment.

Fix footer view tracking.

addFooterView() must be called before setAdapter() Android 4.3 and
below. Make sure to never run into trouble with that by always attaching
our loading view and just setting its visibility as needed.

Don't use a tag handler singleton.

The tag handler has internal state. As HtmlUtils.encode() is called from
multiple threads, this leads to issues we can avoid by simply creating a
new instance.
Some fixes for Crashlytics reported issues.

Improve progress dialog state tracking.

Fix footer view tracking.

addFooterView() must be called before setAdapter() Android 4.3 and
below. Make sure to never run into trouble with that by always attaching
our loading view and just setting its visibility as needed.

Don't use a tag handler singleton.

The tag handler has internal state. As HtmlUtils.encode() is called from
multiple threads, this leads to issues we can avoid by simply creating a
new instance.
Some fixes for Crashlytics reported issues.

Don't use a ListView inside a ScrollView.

Doing so leads to only the first item being visible.

Prevent accidential refreshes.

In particular, only allow swipe-to-refresh if both there wasn't any other
swipe consumer active during start of scroll and the swipe was straight
downwards.

Revert 'Remove unneeded permission.'

This reverts commit 26d6d7e4d676a43013cb83262dc0415319251c2f.

We still need this, as we're using

Gingerbread HTTPS hack.

Refactor load error handling.

Instead of replacing the whole activity view with an empty page if
there's no connection during onCreate(), handle exceptions during load
by showing an error overlay and a SnackBar offering a retry.

Globally enable resize soft input mode.

We add our scrolling containers asynchronously (via fragments) in a lot
of cases, and the system may pick the automatic scrolling mode before
that, leading to panning mode being (incorrectly) selected.

Stop animating header layout changes.

It's probably more jarring than helpful, and it causes the comment box
position to look wrong during animation.

Improve SVG size handling.

Instead of crashing if an SVG doesn't provide a document size,
gracefully fall back to using the device's display size, taking into
account the SVG aspect ratio if available.

Use a common base class for the activities hosting a single fragment
only, so the setChildScrollDelegate() call is neither forgotten nor
duplicated.

to ensure correct order of the various things done in onCreate() of the
various activity subclasses.
